111111.judgment_english: The Creative works sublime success, Furthering through perseverance.

000000.judgment_english: The Receptive brings about sublime success, Furthering through the perseverance of a mare.

100010.judgment_english: Difficulty at the Beginning works supreme success, Furthering through perseverance.

010001.judgment_english: Youthful Folly has success. It is not I who seek the young fool; The young fool seeks me.

111010.judgment_english: Waiting. If you are sincere, you have light and success. Perseverance brings good fortune.

010111.judgment_english: Conflict. You are sincere and are being obstructed. A cautious halt halfway brings good fortune.

010000.judgment_english: The Army. The army needs perseverance and a strong man. Good fortune without blame.

000010.judgment_english: Holding Together brings good fortune. Inquire of the oracle once again whether you possess sublimity, constancy, and perseverance.
